---
title: "Plots"
output: html_notebook
---



NEAT Generation Plots
```{r, fig.keep='all'}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)

neat.dynamic<- read.csv('finalists/neat_dynamic_4_13.csv')
neat.static<- read.csv('finalists/neat_static_4_13.csv')

?options

options(device="R_DEFAULT_DEVICE")
dev.off()

?ggsave

d<- ggplot(neat.dynamic, aes(x=generation, y= meanFitness)) + 
  geom_point()


#neat.dynamic.mean
ggplot(neat.dynamic, aes(x=generation, y= meanFitness)) + 
  geom_point()+
   geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=neat.dynamic$minFitness, ymax=neat.dynamic$maxFitness), width = .2)+
  ylim(0, 20000)+
  theme_bw()+
  #geom_smooth(method='lm', formula= y~x)+
  labs(title= "NEAT Dynamic (Mean)", x= "Generation", y= "Fitness")
```

```{r}
#neat.dynamic.median
ggplot(neat.dynamic, aes(x=generation, y= medianFitness)) + 
  geom_point()+
   geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=neat.dynamic$minFitness, ymax=neat.dynamic$maxFitness), width = .2)+
  ylim(0, 20000)+
  theme_bw()+
  geom_smooth(method='lm', formula= y~x)+
  labs(title= "NEAT Dynamic (Median)", x= "Generation", y= "Fitness")
```
